Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place for a birthday”
Reviews.Author: RuthPearson
Reviews.Content: excellent choice location spent birthday weekend son spouse found staff extremely welcoming helpful breakfast except sliced bread dry country bread world clean airy decorated immediately opposite cafe bistro 1900 lovely hang drink iced fruit tea eat asparagus season near wonderful restaurants bahn parking peaceful highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Uniformly excellent”
Reviews.Author: ohiobillLima_Ohio
Reviews.Content: hotel aida short 2 block walk savignyplatz sbahn station convenient berlin neighborhood safe hotel 100 building renovated losing charm reception 1 flight greeted competent professional staff remember elevator located reception ascending floors clean bathrooms immaculate decorated muted colors provide pleasant ambience breakfast especially variety fruit breads pastrys meats cheeses computer internet access available fee indicative staffs care setting table family girl table fixed hello kitty motif including stuffed animal rates reasonable hotel excellent choice visiting berlin

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Aida
HotelInfo.Address: Knesebeckstrasse 29, 10623 Berlin, Germany
